item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Edgar Allen Poe
item.description: "We loved with a love that was more than love." -- Edgar Allen Poe

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "de satan ou de dieu, qu'importe! ange ou sirène, qu'importe, si tu rends -- fée aux yeux de velours, rythme, parfum, lueur, ô mon unique reine! -- l'univers moins hideux et les instants moins lourds?" -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Arthur Rimbaud
item.description: "I understand, and not knowing how to express myself without pagan words, I’d rather remain silent" -- Arthur Rimbaud

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things, does the heart find its morning and is refreshed." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by George Borrow
item.description: "Translation is at best an echo." -- George Borrow

item.title: Kimberly add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and a richness to life that nothing else can bring." -- Oscar Wilde
